translation: We can tell Apu's imperfection.
transcript: 阿璞的不完美，呃可能我们大家都看到。

translation: We met each other back in 1984.
transcript: 我们两个是在1984年的时候认识的。

translation: I was then a college student and just graduated from Arts School.
transcript: 我那个时候是一个大学生，美术学院刚刚毕业。

translation: Apu was new to the Children's Palace to learn drawing.
transcript: 然后阿璞呢，他就刚刚来到少年宫,来学画画。

translation: From then on, 34 years have passed.
transcript: 84年到现在，已经经历了34年了。

translation: Apu has what we call moderate mental retardation.
transcript: 他叫做我们说的轻度精神发育迟缓,啊。

translation: So far, Apu has created around 4100 works, 2000 of which are relevant to classic music.
transcript: 那我们现在看看，阿璞呢，他现在创作的作品有4100余幅作品，其中有2000多幅是画古典音乐的作品。

translation: Now let's talk about Apu.
transcript: 那我们现在看看阿璞。

translation: When such a special kid came to the Children's Palace 34 years ago, it never came across me that 34 years later we would have such a thing called special education or inclusive education.
transcript: 那我想34年前，啊这样一个特殊孩子来到我们少年宫的时候，啊我一点都意识不到，啊，当34年以后，我们会有一个啊特殊教育的这样子的一个融合教育的这样子的一个局面。

translation: Well, perhaps I was the first teacher who had to deal with children with special conditions.
transcript: 呃，也许我是少年宫里面第一个面对特殊孩子的一个老师。

translation: When Apu was born, he couldn't open his eyes and nor eat milk, his body was weak.
transcript: 他的父母当他出生的时候，他是眼睛睁不开，他，嗯呃吃奶都不会吸吸奶，然后身体是软绵绵的。

translation: Facing a baby like him, his parents really hoped that some divine power could come down and save them.
transcript: 然后面对这样子的一个孩子的时候，他们可能真的是希望有什么力量可以拯救他们。

translation: In the picture down below, you can see me on the left side and Apu on the right side.
transcript: 呃，最下面的一个呃一张照片是，左边的那个是我，然后最右边的那个是阿璞。

translation: There was the large painting.
transcript: 呃我们可以看到这么大的一个场面的一个画。

translation: He painted with his tiny figure, waving his brushes.
transcript: 他这样子的一个小小的身躯，挥动着画笔在作画。

translation: You could tell that he is really talented.
transcript: 可以看到他真的是非常有天赋的一个孩子。

translation: 20 years ago, when Apu published his first album, we founded an Art Experimental Class for Children With Special Needs.
transcript: 那在20年前，他出本他出版他的第一本画册的时候，阿璞呢，呃我们就成立了一个叫特殊儿童美术实验班。

translation: We recruited a dozen of children, some had cerebral palsy, some with autism or Down's Syndrome etc. They were kids with special needs.
transcript: 那这个班里面呢，啊招收了有十多个，啊我们说的是脑瘫的，嗯，呃，还有自闭症的，还有唐氏综合症的等等的这样子的一些孩子。

translation: We taught these children on a voluntary basis, including Apu.
transcript: 我们免费地去教一些这样子的孩子，阿璞也在其中。

translation: It was our hope that through an example like Apu's, we could encourage children with special needs to express themselves through arts.
transcript: 我们是希望能够，嗯，有阿璞这样子的一个个案，能够激励更多的特殊孩子去啊用艺术去表达自己。

translation: Therefore, in 2006, when we finished the construction of the 2nd Children's Palace, we founded the Center of Special Education to provide specific services for these children.
transcript: 那么我们06年，当我们这个第二少年宫落成的时候，我们就正式成立了特殊教育中心，啊，为特殊孩子开展专项的服务。

translation: In 2010, we received the financial support from lottery institutions.
transcript: 在一零年的时候，我们有了福彩金的支持。

translation: From then on, every year we would provide 2000 non-profit tuition-free degrees to social candidates.
transcript: 然后每年呢，向社会提供2000个公益性的免费学位。

translation: So far we have provided altogether 15000 free degrees.
transcript: 啊，迄今我们已经有一万五千个免费学位。

translation: We're grateful for the progress from just a dozen of children to around 2000 children with our degree.
transcript: 那么我们从十多个孩子，现在我们看到有2000多个这样子的学位，我们真的非常感恩。

translation: Thanks to Apu who had inspired us to help children like him, we have gone far to where we are now today.
transcript: 呃，因为，啊，可能是阿璞的原因，我们当时只是一个很小的一种愿望，然后我们走到今天，我们非常感恩。

translation: Currently we have opened over 60 art education courses and we could provide the door-to-door service.
transcript: 那么我们现在有60多门的艺术教育的课程，同时呢，就是我们有呃送教上门的。

translation: For instance, we could provide arts courses or music courses to children in hospital, such as the ward for cancer patients in a Guangzhou hospital, both regularly and irregularly.
transcript: 比如说我们在广州市的有个医院，我们会有一些是定期，有一些是不定期的，在癌症病房里面去，呃，有我们的美术课，有一些是有音乐课的。

translation: We also deliver art courses in welfare house.
transcript: 然后我们还会在福利院里面，啊，呃，有艺术课，等等。

translation: Our goal is that all children could play to their full strength.
transcript: 那么我们的目标，我们希望每个孩子都能够把他们自己的能力发挥得最好。

translation: Every child is unique.
transcript: 每个孩子都是很独一无二的。

translation: We hope they could become the best version of themselves.
transcript: 让他们能够能够成为最好的自己。

translation: In 2014, we founded our Inclusive Art Group.
transcript: 然后我们在一四年的时候，我们又有一个融合艺术团。

translation: I'll play an introduction video so you can know our group better.
transcript: 这个融合艺术团的介绍，我现在放一个视频给大家看。

translation: Our children's palace has been working on special education for 20 years, now we witness a harmony between the kids, with or without a condition, they get along with each other very well.
transcript: 就是我们少年宫走了20年的路，然后特殊教育的路我们走到现在，我们看到我们有很多普通孩子，跟我们跟特殊孩子，我们在一个很融洽的这样子的一个时间空间里面。

translation: Every time when I see this picture and notice how they get along with each other so well, I feel happy from the bottom of my heart.
transcript: 啊当我看到这张照片的时候，我真的是，啊，很很心里面很愉快、很喜悦，啊因为真的是看到这一群孩子，他们和睦相处。

translation: Let us take a look.
transcript: 我们可以看看。

translation: Over the last couple of days, I sorted out the video materials TV stations have shot for Apu.
transcript: 呃，这几天我把过去电视台拍我们阿璞的有一些呃节目做了一些整理。

translation: This one was made 30 years ago by Art Gallary Program of Guangdong TV station when Apu was just 10 years old.
transcript: 然后我翻到30年前，呃广东电视台艺术长廊拍的，阿璞那个时候他大概十岁。

translation: He was really into drawing.
transcript: 然后他真的是很沉迷于画画。

translation: Back then he could still walk like all the others.
transcript: 然后呢，嗯，他行走还是很正常。

translation: And another video shot by Oriental Horizon Program of CCTV 20 years ago.
transcript: 然后又翻到了一个将近20年前的中央电视台的这个东方时空拍阿璞的这样子的一个节目。

translation: Then he had shown severe mental retardation.
transcript: 然后那个时候，他有比较严重的呃精神障碍。

translation: He was then working on his album.
transcript: 啊，然后呢，当时也是正在出他那本画册。

translation: His mother who was still very young, spoke of her concern with a lumpy throat and cried in tears.
transcript: 呃他的妈妈，呃那个时候还比较年轻，然后她用咽哽的声音，就是擦着眼泪说着自己的担心，她自己的担忧。

translation: 20 years have passed.
transcript: 20年过去了。

translation: Now Apu's mother is a grey-haired woman.
transcript: 阿璞的妈妈现在白发苍苍。

translation: She went through a knee surgery and has trouble walking, suffering from all sorts of ailments.
transcript: 膝盖做了手术，而且行动非常不方便，啊各种各样的病缠绕缠绕着身体。

translation: Apu has had a hard life.
transcript: 哦，阿璞的经历，生命里面的风风雨雨。

translation: For example, he has to wear catheter to urinate.
transcript: 比如因为他会在小便，他的小便不能，他是要用导尿管的。

translation: So it causes a lot of inconvenience for him to go out.
transcript: 所以他每天，每次出来都非常不方便。

translation: Every year he needs to go to the hospital to go through a bladder augmentation.
transcript: 然后，嗯，每一年他都要去医院做一次膀胱的增容手术。

translation: Life is full of ups and downs.
transcript: 嗯生活就是这样起起落落。

translation: So his life is basically filled with drawing, medication and rehabilitation surgery, time after time.
transcript: 然后画画、吃药、做康复手术成了他的常态。

translation: It is not convenient for him to go out, for the difficulty in hailing a taxi.
transcript: 然后出行的时候非常不便，因为打的士非常不容易。

translation: For the parents whose child with walking issues, especially those with celebral palsy, they see their child growing up by days and themselves aging at the same time, it becomes more and more difficult for them to carry their child.
transcript: 其实所有行动不便的孩子，尤其是那些脑瘫的孩子，他们的父母有都有一个经验，就是孩子一天天地长大，他们的孩子长大了，妈妈爸爸也老了，他们越来越不能抱着自己的孩子。

translation: The day will come when they couldn't do it anymore.
transcript: 然后呢，他们总会有一天，会再也抱不起自己的孩子的一天。

translation: At that time, a common experience for parents in difficulties is that even taxi drivers would ignore them.
transcript: 那同时，这种很普遍的经历就是，他们举步维艰的时候呢，常常连的士司机都不会看他一眼。

translation: But what I'm trying to say is that we might experience what they have experienced.
transcript: 但是我想说，他们的遭遇也一定会成为我们的遭遇。

translation: Why?
transcript: 为什么呢？

translation: Because we all will age one day and one day we will be seated in a wheelchair.
transcript: 因为每个人都会老去，每个人都有可能会有坐在轮椅上面的时候。

translation: My parents, one at the age of 80 and another at the age of 90.
transcript: 最近我的父母，啊，一个80多，一个90多。

translation: They have been sent to hospitals.
transcript: 他们都相继进了医院。

translation: As I watch them aging, I can feel that my body is aging as well.
transcript: 我看着他们衰老，我自己的身体，啊，也在渐渐地衰老起来。

translation: Sometimes I have trouble moving around or feel pain in my knees.
transcript: 然后我的腿脚有时候会有不方便，比如说膝盖会疼啊像等等的这些。

translation: I can't say for sure that I will never sit in a wheelchair.
transcript: 那我想我不敢保证我这辈子我就不会坐轮椅。

translation: So maybe one day when I'm old, I will need to sit in a wheelchair just like Apu does or I might need mobility aids.
transcript: 所以，当我老了，也许有一天我会像阿璞那样子坐在轮椅上或者会推着那个助行器。

translation: So now we go back to our 20 years' efforts in education for children with special needs and inclusive education.
transcript: 说了这么多，当我们回到我们特殊儿童的教育和融合教育20年的话题上。

translation: What I really want to say is I feel immensely grateful for those children and their families, for their parents.
transcript: 其实我很想跟这些特殊孩子和他们的家庭，跟他们的父母说，感恩有你们。

translation: It might seem that for the past 20 years, we have provided a lot to them, such as the number of degrees or the amount of resources, we provided opportunities to these children to speak up in front of the public and to show their presence and talents.
transcript: 因为20年来，表面上似乎是我们给了你们很多，比如说我们刚刚在屏幕上，我们看到每一周我们有多少多少的学位给他们，然后我们有多少多少的资源给他们，嗯然后他们在公众面前怎么样地发声，表达自己的存在，展示自己的才华等等。

translation: But I believe it is these children that have given us the opportunities to rediscover our compassion towards people and to love people as we love ourselves.
transcript: 但是我更是想说的是，是孩子们给了我们机会，让我们重新重新拾回应该有的爱心，彼此相爱，我们学会爱人如己。

translation: It seems that we are helping them, but in fact, we are also helping ourselves.
transcript: 因为我们表面上似乎在帮助他们，其实我们是在帮助我们自己。

translation: None of us can say for sure that we won't end up holding a cane or sitting in a wheelchair.
transcript: 因为我们每个人都不敢保证自己永远都不会拄着拐杖，坐在轮椅上。

translation: I'm dedicated to inclusive education simply because one day when I get old, when I call a taxi sitting in a wheelchair, the taxi driver wouldn't choose to ignore me.
transcript: 我做融合教育，是因为希望我有一天老了，当我坐在轮椅上的时候，我要打的士，不会因为我坐在轮椅上，的士呼啸而过，就这么简单。

translation: I would like to wrap up the speech with two lines I wrote a long time ago.
transcript: 今天我翻出来我自己，呃，曾经写过两段话，作为我今天发言的结束。

translation: To sugar baby, whose name I still don't know, it is so good to see you.
transcript: 这个我至今还不知道你名字的糖宝宝，有你真好。

translation: That day, the tiny and soft you ran towards me, hugged and kissed me.
transcript: 那一天当小小的你，柔弱的你，向我扑过来抱我、亲我。

translation: The sudden trust and love, as if a beam of warm sunshine, cleared away all the pain or sadness inside my heart.
transcript: 这突如其来的信任和爱意像一缕温暖的阳光，驱走了那一天我心中所有的阴霾。

translation: At that very moment, you were so strong that you could save and complete the world that lacked love.
transcript: 那一刻的你是如此的强大，足以拯救整个被爱的缺失而失掉的世界。

translation: According to the so-called social standards, people would think of you as a defected or even useless person.
transcript: 而这个社会的标准，常常是会这样看你，你只是一个有缺陷的，甚至是一个废人。

translation: It is good to have you, children of the Art Group.
transcript: 艺术团的所有孩子们，有你们真好。

translation: One day in a crowd, I saw one secretary of our art group pushing around his friend in a wheelchair and we passed each other.
transcript: 那一天在熙熙攘攘的人流中，我看见了我们艺术团的一个小秘书推着他的小伙伴，一个坐在轮椅上的孩子，匆匆地从我车身边擦肩而过。

translation: That beautiful scenario was forever engraved in my mind.
transcript: 这个画面真的是如此的美好，它就牢牢地定格在我的心里面了。

translation: We're here today mainly for one purpose, to discuss one concern, the concern of Apu's mother's for herself, for Apu, or our shared concern for one day ending up in the wheelchair when we get older.
transcript: 今天有你有我，有我们大家在这里，也许目的只有一个，就是阿璞的母亲对她自己的担忧，对她儿子的担忧，我们对自己的可能某一天会坐在轮椅上的担忧。

translation: But now the concern will no longer exist.
transcript: 每一个人所有的类似的担忧，都会成为过去。

translation: Because we will love others the same way we love ourselves.
transcript: 因为当我们怀着爱人如己的心。

translation: When people warm and protect each other, when people love each other, will it be long before we form a united community of destiny?
transcript: 能够彼此温暖，彼此守望，彼此相爱的时候，我们成为命运的共同体的时候，那么这样的时刻离我们还会远吗？

translation: Because with each other's love, there will be no worries nor fear.
transcript: 因为在彼此的爱里面就不会再担忧，就不会再惧怕了。

translation: I believe this is the most important significance of inclusive education.
transcript: 我想这就是融合教育的最大意义了。

translation: Thank you all!
transcript: 谢谢大家。
